commit message: Updated methodes corresponding to the new dump check method.
Added warning notice about appending dumps via save dialog.

Reactivated ProGuard to shrink the (release-) APK.

ProGuard disabled: MifareClassicTool-1.7.5.apk ~ 704k
ProGuard enabled: MifareClassicTool-1.7.5.apk ~ 588k
Show a donate notice at updates.
Small improvement of the validity check for dumps.
Added donate link in about dialog.

Fixed lint warnings.

Updated android target version to API level 20.

New release: 1.7.6

Updated changelog.
Updated readme.
Increased version number.
